meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mike Varn Bugs Twocock Dale Ragus Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1166.

td.p: Mike Varn, an economist and forecaster originally from Anniston, Alabama
Bugs Twocock, a civil servant from Victoria, British Columbia
Dale Ragus, a real estate broker from New York City, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,801)

tr.td: U.S. CITIES
THE POST OFFICE
SONGS OF THE '70s
ANIMALS
SPANISH 101
FINAL RESTING PLACES
